In .tf_configure.bazelrc
build --action_env CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH="/autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/cuda/targets/ppc64le-linux/lib"

need to drop the /lib at the end and change to:
build --action_env CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH="/autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/cuda/targets/ppc64le-linux"

It looks for CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH/include/cudnn,h
